mapper.sql: fpd.finished_product_det_id, fpd.finished_product_id, fpd.product_model_id, fpd.reality_outquantity, fpd.warehouse_id, fpd.warehouse_user_id, fpd.`status`, fpd.create_user_id, fpd.create_time, fpd.modified_user_id, fpd.modified_time, fpd.is_delete
mapper.select:
SELECT , su.user_name AS create_user_name, sus.user_name AS modified_user_name, suy.user_name AS warehouse_user_name, fp.finished_product_code, pm.product_model_code, pm.product_model_name, w.warehouse_code, w.warehouse_name FROM wms_out_finished_product_det AS fpd LEFT JOIN ocean.sys_user su ON fpd.create_user_id = su.user_id LEFT JOIN ocean.sys_user sus ON fpd.modified_user_id = sus.user_id LEFT JOIN ocean.sys_user suy ON fpd.warehouse_user_id = suy.user_id LEFT JOIN wms_out_finished_product fp ON fpd.finished_product_id = fp.finished_product_id LEFT JOIN smt_product_model pm ON fpd.product_model_id = pm.product_model_id LEFT JOIN smt_warehouse w ON fpd.warehouse_id = w.warehouse_id
and date_format(fp.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
and fp.finished_product_code like CONCAT('%', #{finishedProductCode}, '%')
and pm.product_model_code like CONCAT('%', #{productMaterialCode}, '%')
and pm.product_model_name like CONCAT('%', #{productMaterialName}, '%')
and w.warehouse_code like CONCAT('%', #{warehouseCode}, '%')
and w.warehouse_name like CONCAT('%', #{warehouseName}, '%')
and fpd.status=#{status}
